definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: In fact, it's between the Xicheng district and Dongcheng district.
sentences.chinese: 其實在西城區和東城區之間。

sentences.english: If you're not on the list, go to the East Side and go to a bar there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你榜上無名，就請去東城區的酒吧。

sentences.english: The QVS Global Head office and production facility is located in Dongcheng district Dongguan City.
sentences.chinese: 珂維斯公司總部以及生產設備均位於東莞市東城區。

sentences.english: In this paper, the Dongcheng District, Beijing, a study project as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用北京市東城區的某項目作爲研究實例。

sentences.english: They rented a flat at Hepingli, Dongcheng District, Beijing and settled down.
sentences.chinese: 他們在北京東城區的和平里租了一套房子，住了下來。

definition: Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
Makung city in Penghu county 澎湖縣|澎湖县[Peng2 hu2 xian4] (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan
Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Nanshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang
Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
